Question
========
What is the main benefit of providing a detailed prompt to an AI coding tool?

Answerlist
----------
* It guarantees the AI will never make mistakes
* It reduces back-and-forth by guiding the AI toward the desired output
* It stops the AI from using external packages
* It makes the code run faster automatically

Solution
========
Detailed prompts lead to outputs closer to what you want and reduce iteration.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
